I don't have much experience in AWS and GCP, I did use both of them.

AWS is more focusing on IaaS which means it will be more low underlying, hard to use, but more flexible for Client.

GCP is more like a PaaS, which is high level, easy to learn, and not flexible.

Therefore, it's all depends on the business requirements.
